data: {"About-Me":[{"Title":"A Clean Home = A Happy Home","Content":"Feel the difference a truly clean home makes. A spotless, welcoming space you can be proud of — without the stress. I focus on the details, work with honesty and precision, and take cleaning off your plate so you can focus on what matters most: living your life."}],"Services":[{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Tidying Up","Description":"Replace trash bags"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Tidying Up","Description":"Dust"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Floors","Description":"Vacuum/sweep and mop"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Kitchen","Description":"Wipe down kitchen appliances and sink"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Kitchen","Description":"Counters"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Bathrooms","Description":"Clean bathrooms"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Windows","Description":"Window panes"},{"Service":"Basic Clean","Name":"Windows","Description":"Window sills"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Kitchen & Appliances","Description":"Cabinets"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Kitchen & Appliances","Description":"Inside appliances"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Bathrooms","Description":"Clean shower heads"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Bathrooms","Description":"Remove soap-scrum and limescale"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Living Areas","Description":"Under furniture"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Living Areas","Description":"Under couch and chair cushions"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Windows & Doors","Description":"Window blinds"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Windows & Doors","Description":"Window tracks"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Windows & Doors","Description":"Window panes"},{"Service":"Deep Clean","Name":"Windows & Doors","Description":"Doors"}],"Promotions":[{"Title":"Spook-Free Clean","Content":"New customers save $15 on their first deep clean.","Start Date":"10/01/2025","End Date":"10/31/2025"}],"Testimonials":[{"Name (optional)":"Unknown","Content":"Melinda does a wonderful job cleaning!","":"← This is an example"}]}
